items.name: Data Artifex
items.description: Data Artifex is a Python-based, open-source ecosystem that elevates data into API-powered, machine-actionable digital knowledge.

items.name: Nectar Publisher
items.description: Document your tabular datasets and create codebooks and machine actionable metadata using DDI.

items.name: Sikt DDI-CDI converter
items.description: The DDI-CDI Converter Prototype is a Python-based web application developed to convert statistical files from Stata, SPSS, and CSV formats into DDI-CDI JSON-LD files. This prototype meets the growing demand for interoperability and data sharing by transforming various data formats into an open, standardized, and machine-readable format.
